dmca.title: DDoS attacks to IRC network
dmca.body:
From: AnimeXero Network
To: AnimeLab IRC Network
Date: 22nd day of November, 2006
Reguarding: Recent Attacks/Damage

This is a Demand for immediate cease of attacks. (Cease & Desist)

Dear Sir or Madam,

This letter serves as a notification to cease and desist all attacking
activities towards The AnimeXero Network and all activities therein.

You will cease all activities of this such originating from your
userbase, including but not limited to the person(s) under the aliases
of "John2"; "xion"; "killa-cam"; and "tao_master". This activity is
illegal and unlawful according to international law(s), treaties and the
Terms set forth by Internet Service Provider(s) (ISPs). You have 48
hours to comply with this notice.

Additionally, any further entry to the AnimeXero Network for the
purpose(s) of: defamatory statements, collecting information (spying),
Denial of Service attacks, and/or any other attack method will be taken
as a hostile invasion and or an invasion of privacy and further action
will be taken.

I am writing on behalf of the AnimeXero Network and This notice
represents the interests of the AnimeXero Network regarding this case.

Mark "Kradorex Xeron" Green
-Services Administrator, AnimeXero IRC network
-Chief Operations Administrator, DigitalNET Operations and Digibase
Operations (subsidiary of DigitalNET Operations)
